name: Nyx Prime
description: Infiltrate the minds of your enemies with Nyx Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Mind Control
abilities.description: Nyx seizes control of a target's mind, compelling them to fight for the Tenno cause. Controlled enemies have increased <DT_RADIATION_COLOR>Radiation Status Chance. When Nyx shoots them, they also have an increased Damage Multiplier.

abilities.name: Psychic Bolts
abilities.description: Nyx unleashes a volley of psychic bolts that track and strike nearby enemies with telekinetic precision. When enemies are slain, additional bolts scatter to new targets. Striking foes weakens their defenses and transfers a portion to Nyx.

abilities.name: Chaos
abilities.description: Nyx releases a devastating psychic pulse, disorienting enemies in a wide radius and forcing them to turn on each other. Confused foes lash out at random factions.

abilities.name: Absorb
abilities.description: Nyx draws in and contains the damage dealt to her and the damage confused enemies deal to each other then converts it into a devastating radial blast. Following the blast, she enters a brief invulnerable state and gains a Weapon Damage boost proportional to the absorbed damage.

languages.description: Dringe mit Nyx Prime in die Gedanken deiner Feinde ein. Mit veränderten Mod-Polaritäten für noch mehr Anpassungsmöglichkeiten.
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: Infiltrez-vous dans les pensées de vos ennemis avec Nyx Prime. Comporte d'ailleurs des polarités de mod modifiées pour permettre plus de personnalisation.
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: Penetra nella mente dei tuoi nemici con Nyx Prime. Presenta polarità mod alterate per una maggiore personalizzazione.
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: 닉스 프라임과 함께 적의 정신에 침투해보세요. 더욱 다채로운 특성화를 위한 추가적인 모드 극성이 포함되어 있습니다.
languages.name: 닉스 프라임

languages.description: Infíltrate en la mente de tus enemigos con Nyx Prime. Cuenta con polaridades de mod alteradas para una mayor personalización.
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: 通过 Nyx Prime 来渗透进敌人的精神中。拥有改造过的 Mod 极性槽，可提供更优秀的自定义空间。
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: Атакуйте разум ваших противников с Никс Прайм. Обладает дополнительными полярностями слотов для более тонкой настройки.
languages.name: Никс Прайм

languages.description: 敵の精神に侵入するNyx Prime。MOD極性が追加されているため、より多彩なカスタマイズを施すことができる。
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: Przeniknij do umysłów swoich wrogów przy pomocy Nyx Prime. Zawiera zmienione polaryzacje, dla większych możliwości personalizacji.
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: Infiltre-se na mente do inimigo com a Nyx Prime. Inclusas polaridades alteradas de mods para uma maior personalização.
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: 通過 Nyx Prime 來滲透進敵人的精神中。擁有改造過的 MOD 極性槽，可提供更優秀的自訂性。
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: Nyx Prime มีพลังในการแทรกซึมเข้าไปในจิตใจของศัตรู มีการปรับเปลี่ยนขั้ว Mod เพื่อช่วยให้การปรับแต่งดียิ่งขึ้น
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: Nyx Prime ile düşmanlarınızın bilinçaltına girin. Daha iyi bir mod dizilimi için geliştirilmiş mod kutupları ile sizlerle.
languages.name: Nyx Prime

languages.description: Майстриня з контролювання думок ворогів. Має змінені полярності комірок модифікаторів задля гнучкості удосконалення.
languages.name: Нікс-прайм
